column1: Little Goat Diner////5 stars for the combination of atmosphere and food - 4 stars for the food- expect to wait we waited close to 2 hours - Interesting mix of Food Network loving
column3: hipsters and families.  Food is creative and a lot to choose from
column4: vibe is vibrant the design puts a modem spin on 70s Diner design with that is bright
column5: energetic and loud.  Wait staff is well-trained and food has enough creative spins to keep you coming back to try more
